response.answer_text: No , 2020 is not the worst year !! Now many people say how ?? As covid 19 occurs , famous actors dies , economy loss and other destruction !! So u all say that it is the worst year !! But let me tell u one thing ! 2020 is just a year(basically its a year which is created by humankind). So we cant say 2020 is worst year as these all problem was created by us(mankind). So why we blame a date or year for any destruction or anything !! If scientists don’t create made mistake in lab , then covid-19 not occur ! So this all is the mistake of human ! Who did this things but now blame on a year ! Hope you understand :) ^this is my first answer , if u agree with my views,upvote & follow :)

I think that 2020 is the worst year for all of us because we have seen many things which we should not see large number of people suffered from many diseases and many have lost their life this year show all bad things in an individual life with my experience from few last years this year brings lots of things which are dangerous for life.
